arts.ttl: David Moyes says he is already 'burnt out' after four days in Everton job
arts.sum: Moyes returned as Toffees boss over the weekend and led them to a 1-0 defeat to Aston Villa in his first game on Wednesday evening

arts.ttl: David Moyes agreed Everton return SIX years ago as hierarchy at 'loggerheads' over manager picks
arts.sum: The Scottish manager could have returned for his second Toffees stint much earlier

arts.ttl: David Moyes gives brutal Everton verdict after defeat in first match back
arts.sum: David Moyes suffered defeat on his return to Everton, with the new manager confessing the club's financial issues are clear to see when you analyse the state of the squad

arts.ttl: David Moyes: I can’t magic an end to Everton’s goalscoring woes
arts.sum: Everton suffered a 1-0 home defeat to Aston Villa in David Moyes’ first game back as manager.

arts.ttl: Everton 0-1 Aston Villa: Highlights, man of the match, stats as David Moyes suffers defeat in first Premier League match as boss
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Wednesday's Premier League clash between Everton and Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Everton prove point David Moyes has already made to owners in Aston Villa defeat
arts.sum: EVERTON 0-1 ASTON VILLA: England striker Ollie Watkins scored the only goal of the game at Goodison Park as David Moyes' return as manager of the Toffees saw the Merseysiders' defeated by Unai Emery's men

arts.ttl: Ollie Watkins ruins David Moyes’ return as Everton boss
arts.sum: There was no dream start to the 61-year-old Scot’s homecoming to the Goodison Park dugout as Aston Villa secured victory.

arts.ttl: David Moyes comeback turns sour as Everton show the unromantic reality
arts.sum: Everton 0-1 Aston Villa: Ollie Watkins’s second-half goal was enough to ensure Moyes’s first game back as Toffees boss ended in defeat

arts.ttl: 'He is very impressive': South American expert urges Arsenal to push for £30m striker who 'really bullied Vitor Reis'
arts.sum: Arsenal are currently on the lookout for a new striker this month amid a pressing need for attacking reinforcements. The Gunners currently lack an out-and-out...

arts.ttl: Report: Everton now keen to sign £7.5m forward whose agent is actually the brother of David Moyes
